*****************************************
[Investigating] CWA Policy and Scan Issue
*****************************************

We are aware of CWA customers experiencing the following issues:

* Policies and Scan profiles not visible on UI
* CWA Scans not working

Please note that all other aspects of our Cloud Workload Assurance service remain functional. We are investigating this issue and will provide an update as soon as more information becomes available.
